descriptionHTML:
Drop vertical blocks of 4, clear them, and aim for a HIGH SCORE!
Even on the small touchscreen of your Android Wear device, a simple TAP action is all you need to enjoy this game to its fullest!
With the convenience of an in-game clock, 'Dragon Laser' was designed specially to provide both entertainment and enrichment of your lifestyle!

FEATURES
★ Enjoy our fast-paced block dropping game 'Dragon Laser' and challenge your own HIGH SCORE!
★ Simple TAP action to drop blocks and navigate your way around the game!
★ Check the current time even when you're playing this exciting game!
★ Play the game directly on your wearable device!

'Dragon Laser' is optimized for and compatible with LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch (Including all Android 4.2 devices and above)

NOW the game can be played on smartphones and tablets too.

Thank you for choosing and playing 'Dragon Laser'!
Kindly give feedback by writing to us at: "support@dreamrocket.sg"
Check for our latest news at our company website: "http://www.dreamrocket.sg"
comments: Well... It's tough as nails for me, but visually very appealing.
